topic.title: 2.1.2 Removing of X & Y-Axis Locking Fixture

header.para: Removing of X & Y-Axis Locking Fixture

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Turn OFF the power supply before performing the following procedures.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Make sure to place the Warning tag on operation panel, main power switch and other location to ensure that other personnel do not turn ON the power inadvertently which could result in the machine being operated.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-1px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:15px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Remove the mounting screws to remove the X & Y Axis locking fixture painted with yellow color before enabling the axes.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:12px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: Figure <%HMFIGURECOUNTER3=2%>.<%HMFIGURECOUNTER%> Removal of X- & Y-Axis Locking Fixture

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:0px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;
